bibl.title: Akten des XIII. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses Marburg/Lahn, 2. bis 6. August 1971.

series.title: Münchener Beiträge zur Papyrusforschung und antiken Rechtsgeschichte.

bibl.seg: Kiessling Emil und Hans-Albert Rupprecht (Hgg.), Akten des XIII. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses Marburg/Lahn, 2. bis 6. August 1971. (Münchener Beiträge zur Papyrusforschung und antiken Rechtsgeschichte. 66.)
München, C.H. Beck, 1974, 8°, xx-501 pp. et 8 pll.

C.R. par Charles Astruc, BBF 22 (1977) pp. 107-108. - Dorothy Crawford, JHS 96 (1976) pp. 267-268. - Jiri Cvetler, Eirene 14 (1976) pp. 155-157. - Isaak F. Fikhman, VDI 143 (1978, fasc. 1) pp. 188-198. - Hans Georg Gundel, ZDMG 127 (1977) pp. 76-77. - Hermann Harrauer, WS N.F., 11 (1977) pp. 254-255. - Herbert Hunger, JÖBG 24 (1975) p. 273. - Jean Leenaerts, Latomus 35 (1976) pp. 669-672. - Georges Nachtergael, Byzantion 46 (1976) pp. 571-574. - F. Carter Philips, BASP (1977) pp. 99-102. - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 24-25 (1976) pp. 172-178. - John R. Rea, CR N.S., 27 (1977) pp. 146-147. - Tony Reekmans, BibO 33 (1976) pp. 27-29. - J. David Thomas, JEA 61 (1975) pp. 299-300. - Gerhard Thür, ZSav 96 (1979) pp. 479-480. - Kurt Treu, ThLZ 100 (1975) coll. 600-602.
